name: Aquaponic Control System - see inside
info:
Sensors:

    -tank-N water low 
    -tank-N water high 
    -tank-N analog height sensor
    -flow meters (plant drain, tank-N drain, pump)
    -temperature (tank-N, soil, ambient)
    -light intensity (multispectral)
    -failsafe sensors
        -tank/bed float switch
        -water in overflow
    
Actuators:

    -tank2bed pump 
    -lights (50-200W, IR, PAR, white)
    
Alerts:

    -email (subscribe model)
    -SMS (subscribe model)
    -audible
    -status light
    -UI
    -dweet

UI:

    -graphs of variables with time
    -physical system controls
    -camera
    -alerts

name: convert voltage to resistance
add NTC B57991S 10k Thermister datasheet to payload
1st derivative - 2pt
Steinhart-Hart Matrix (TempC)
add TDK NTC B57164K 10k Thermister datasheet to payload
func:
//TODO:
//the ka, kb, kc Steinhart-Hart constants should be calculated ONCE
//for all of these entries, THEN passed on with the calculated values.

var datasheet =
{
    //seems to be 62 points in the datasheet for TDK B57991S Thermistors
    //2908-type data, 2013 March version.  You got these from Alan.
    desc: "TDK B57164K0103+000 10k Thermistor Table",
    number: "2904",
    nominalvalue: "10000", //ohms, 25C, 298K
    B: "4300",
    Bacc: "0.03", //plusminus 3%
   data: [
        { tempC: "-55.0",  rtr25_ratio:"121.46", alpha: "7.4"},
        { tempC: "-50.0",  rtr25_ratio:"84.439", alpha: "7.2"},
        { tempC: "-45.0",  rtr25_ratio:"59.243", alpha: "7.1"},
        { tempC: "-40.0",  rtr25_ratio:"41.938", alpha: "6.9"},
        { tempC: "-35.0",  rtr25_ratio:"29.947", alpha: "6.7"},
        
        { tempC: "-30.0",  rtr25_ratio:"21.567", alpha: "6.6"},
        { tempC: "-25.0",  rtr25_ratio:"15.641", alpha: "6.3"},
        { tempC: "-20.0",  rtr25_ratio:"11.466", alpha: "6.2"},
        { tempC: "-15.0",  rtr25_ratio:"8.4510", alpha: "6.0"},
        { tempC: "-10.0",  rtr25_ratio:"6.2927", alpha: "5.9"},
        
        { tempC: "-5.0",  rtr25_ratio:"4.7077", alpha: "5.7"},
        { tempC: "0.0",  rtr25_ratio:"3.5563", alpha: "5.5"},
        { tempC: "5.0",  rtr25_ratio:"2.7119", alpha: "5.3"},
        { tempC: "10.0",  rtr25_ratio:"2.0860", alpha: "5.1"},
        { tempC: "15.0",  rtr25_ratio:"1.6204", alpha: "5.0"},
        
        { tempC: "20.0",  rtr25_ratio:"1.2683", alpha: "4.8"},
        { tempC: "25.0",  rtr25_ratio:"1.0000", alpha: "4.7"},
        { tempC: "30.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.79420", alpha: "4.6"},
        { tempC: "35.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.63268", alpha: "4.5"},
        { tempC: "40.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.50740", alpha: "4.3"},
        
        { tempC: "45.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.41026", alpha: "4.2"},
        { tempC: "50.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.33363", alpha: "4.1"},
        { tempC: "55.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.27243", alpha: "4.0"},
        { tempC: "60.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.22370", alpha: "3.9"},
        { tempC: "65.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.18459", alpha: "3.8"},
        
        { tempC: "70.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.15305", alpha: "3.7"},
        { tempC: "75.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.12755", alpha: "3.6"},
        { tempC: "80.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.10677", alpha: "3.5"},
        { tempC: "85.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.089928", alpha: "3.4"},
        { tempC: "90.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.076068", alpha: "3.3"},
        
        { tempC: "95.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.064524", alpha: "3.3"},
        { tempC: "100.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.054941", alpha: "3.2"},
        { tempC: "105.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.047003", alpha: "3.1"},
        { tempC: "110.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.040358", alpha: "3.0"},
        { tempC: "115.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.034743", alpha: "3.0"},
        
        { tempC: "120.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.030007", alpha: "2.9"},
        { tempC: "125.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.026006", alpha: "2.8"},
        { tempC: "130.0",  rtr25_ratio:"0.022609", alpha: "2.8"},

}

name: Blackbody net Energy transfer Inside-Outside
info:
blackbody energy radiative transfer
E = k (Ti^4 - To^4)  
not normalize with k

name: Furnace Duty-Cycle
info:
DC = 100*Ton/(Toff + Ton)

Ton = time furnace on
Toff = time furnace off

Last two values used.

The furnace must go through at slightly MORE
than one complete on-off or off-on cycle
before the duty cycle value becomes valid.
Default: 0%
